content: A carbon footprint is the amount of carbon dioxide pollution that we produce as a result of our activities. Some people try to reduce their carbon footprint because they are concerned about climate change.
translations: ita:Un'impronta di carbonio è la quantità di inquinamento da anidride carbonica che produciamo come risultato delle nostre a
